name: INSIDE THE LINES Football Vol. 1 DVD
description:
NFL STARS:  REGGIE BUSH, STEVE SMITH, TAYLOR MAYS, KEITH RIVERS, TERRELL THOMAS and CARY HARRIS share their unique perspectives, in an unprecedented, instructional program designed for the young athlete with a dream to play football and desire to perform beyond their imagination.


In this highly stylized, state of the art program, the players talk intimately about their early years in youth sports.

They offer rare insight into their days at USC, their work ethic and the level of commitment it takes to succeed in the NFL.
RUN TIME: 52 minutes

EXECUTIVE PRODUCER: Cary Harris
DIRECTOR: Lionel Coleman
